meanings.sent1: The gingivae help hold the teeth in place.
meanings.sent2: I brush my gingivae every morning to keep them healthy.
meanings.sent3: The gingivae giggled when the toothbrush tickled them.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a row of pink gingivae, framing her pearly white teeth.
meanings.sent5: The dentist warned that neglecting your gingivae can lead to gum disease.
